content:
You're welcome! It was my pleasure to help. I hope your mom loves the personalized photo album and that it becomes a treasured keepsake for years to come. Don't hesitate to reach out if you need any more ideas or advice.

Remember, the most important thing is to show your mom how much you care and appreciate her. The thought and effort you're putting into this gift will surely mean the world to her.

Good luck with the surprise, and I hope you have a wonderful time celebrating your mom's birthday!
